endpoints.description: Fetch the current available balance for a user's bank account.
Retrieve the transaction history of a user for a specified period.
Initiate a fund transfer between user-specified accounts.
Download electronic statements of a user's account in a selected time range.
Access detailed information regarding the user's linked accounts.
Register a new banking account in the service.
Update existing account details such as contact information.
Delete or deactivate a specified bank account.
Retrieve the latest foreign exchange rates for supported currencies.
Deposit a specified amount into the user's savings account.
